title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery       Â                 George Rogers Clark Memorial   15 Photos  Photos of the George Rogers Clark Memorial          George Rogers Clark Memorial inside   8 Photos  Murals and statue within the George Rogers Clark Memorial.            Francis Vigo Statue   3 Photos  Francis Vigo was memorialized with a statue along the Wabash River next to the Clark Memorial in 1936.            Pierre Gibault Statue   2 Photos  Father Pierre Gibault was memorialized with a statue in front of the Old Cathedral in 1936.          Park Resources   6 Photos  George Rogers Clark National Historical Park contains a variety of resources including the Lincoln Memorial Bridge approach and pylons.
